text: The harmonic filter solutions provided by veritas control were excellent. Steven was helpful, always provide clear information of their products and recommended a solution that fit our needs perfectly. Highly recommend them for anyone looking for effective energy management solutions.

Had a great experience with Veritas Control Pte Ltd. Their team is easy to work with and always helpful. We have used their VFD in a couple of our projects, and they have been reliable. The support team was there whenever we needed them, which made things run smoothly. Definitely recommend them if you are looking for quality products and good service.
